name: Hide & Seek (CHAS Play)
description:
Hide and Seek is a local multiplayer game based on the classic game of Hide and Seek. The game was developed between January 2020 and May 2020 as a collaborative between Children's Hospices Across Scotland (CHAS), Abertay University and Team Party Penguins.

The game was designed to deliver an accessible and social experience that the children of CHAS could enjoy with their families regardless of any age or playing experience differences, while giving them the medium to create fun and meaningful memories. Hide and Seek is based on the classic children's playground game: two players take turns to alternate between the 'hider' and the 'seeker' within a park environment filled with places to hide. Players have a limited time to both find a hiding spot and seek the other player out.

Hide and Seek is compatible with a PC Keyboard, Xbox One Controller, and the Xbox Adaptive Controller.

To donate to CHAS, please visit chas.org.uk/donate.
